description:
5 pieces of BGM will be added.
Enjoy listening to new music.

■Content
 BGM "AVENGING BATTLE -TRINITY MIX-"
 BGM "ORIENTAL RUSH -TRINITY MIX-"
 BGM "Anegawa -TRINITY MIX-"
 BGM "INCARNATION OF EVIL -TRINITY MIX-"
 BGM "IT'S SAW SQUARED"

■How to use
You can set BGM from camp by selecting "Gallery" - "Music", or by selecting a track from the pre-battle loading screen.
name: BGM Pack 1
